import React from "react"; export default function Rating(props) { const{rating,numReviews}=props return (
= 1 ? "fas fas-star" : rating >= 0.5 ? "fa fa-star-half-o" : "fa fa-star-o" } > = 2 ? "fa fa-star" : props.value >= 1.5 ? "fa fa-star-half-o" : "fa fa-star-o" } > = 3 ? "fa fa-star" : props.value >= 2.5 ? "fa fa-star-half-o" : "fa fa-star-o" } > = 4 ? "fa fa-star" : props.value >= 3.5 ? "fa fa-star-half-o" : "fa fa-star-o" } > = 5 ? "fa fa-star" : props.value >= 4.5 ? "fa fa-star-half-o" : "fa fa-star-o" } > {props.text ? props.text : ""}
); }
